titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of October 29 through November 4, 2017, as "National Obesity Care Week".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of the week of October 29 through November 4, 2017, as "National Obesity Care Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the designation of National Obesity Care Week.
Encourages open communication to break barriers of misunderstanding and stigma regarding obesity and to improve the lives of individuals affected by obesity and their families.
